name: Templates pack NT
description:
Original VCMI default templates with new terrains (NT).

To play these templates, you need to enable the following mods:
1. New terrains pack (created by: Ben Yan, zeryss)
2. Towns new views (created by: Zachari, J.M.Sower, Trith, Toffi, macron1, avatar)
3. Horn of the Abyss/Wasteland terrain submod (by Hota Crew, ported by VCMI Team)
4. Pavilion Town/Dunes terrain submod (by edeksumo, lillith)
5. Asphalt terrain (created by: HOMM modding community)
author: luk3Z
